<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_app_eng_studio.CreatorStudioConstants</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Contains various constants used by other scripts specific to App Engine Studio</description> <name>CreatorStudioConstants</name> <script><![CDATA[var CreatorStudioConstants = {
/** * @deprecated * This seems to be using the wrong name or checking the wrong thing, if need to check * for global scope, use 'GLOBAL_APPLICATION_SCOPE_NAME' */ GLOBAL_APPLICATION_SYS_ID: "global",
GLOBAL_APPLICATION_SCOPE_NAME: "global",
AES_APPLICATION_SYS_ID: "4cb87f6f53703010b846ddeeff7b1289",
MAGIC_SYS_ID: "$sys_id_ui11",
projectTable: { NAME: "sn_app_eng_studio_project" },
applicationProjectLinkTable: { NAME: "sn_app_eng_studio_project_application_m2m" },
appDetailsTable: { NAME: "sn_app_eng_studio_app_details" },
clientParams: { REFERRING_URL: "{client:ReferringUrl}", SCOPE_ID: "{client:ScopeId}", SCOPE_NAME: "{client:ScopeName}", STACKNAME: "{client:StackName}", TABLE: "{client:Table}", VIEW_NAME: "{client:ViewName}" },
sysparms: { NAMEOFSTACK: "sysparm_nameofstack", REDIRECT_URL: "sysparm_redirect_url", REFERRING_URL: "sysparm_referring_url", TRANSACTION_SCOPE: "sysparm_transaction_scope", VIEW: "sysparm_view" },
sorting: { APPS_SORT_APPROVED_FIELDS: ["name", "last_opened_in_aes"], APPS_SORT_DEFAULT_FIELD: "last_opened_in_aes", ASC_ORDER: "asc", DESC_ORDER: "desc" },
errors: { PROJECT_ACCESS_DENIED: "Access to project denied", PROJECT_DOES_NOT_EXIST: "Project does not exist", APPLICATION_ACCESS_DENIED: "Access to application denied", APPLICATION_DOES_NOT_EXIST: "Application cannot be found", APPLICATION_DETAILS_RECORD_NOT_FOUND: "Application Details record cannot be found", TAXONOMY_DOES_NOT_EXIST: "Taxonomy cannot be found", APPLICATION_FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST: "Application file cannot be found", PROJECT_LINK_EXISTS: "Project link already exists", PROJECT_LINK_DOES_NOT_EXIST: "Project link does not exist", OPERATIONS_IMPROPER_FORMAT: "Operations must be an array", INSERT_FAILURE: "Failed to insert record", UPDATE_FAILURE: "Failed to update record", INVALID_TAXONOMY_OR_FILE_OBJECT: "Invalid taxonomy or file object record", },
deploymentStates: { PENDING_APPROVAL: '1', IN_VALIDATION: '2', PUBLISHED: '3', REJECTED: '4' },
groups: { AES_USER_GROUP_ID: '72910dd8779050108a370870a81061a9', AES_USER_LIMITED_GROUP_ID: '553032e853165110b846ddeeff7b12aa', },
roles: { AES_USER_ROLE_ID: '97f4a0c20f123300e54f3c71df767ea2' },
permissionType: { FULL: 'full', },
};]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-17 20:32:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7955a29353223010fe92ddeeff7b12a5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CreatorStudioConstants</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="App Engine Studio" source="sn_app_eng_studio">e046257545b47c84712b8779a9abd0cb</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="App Engine Studio">e046257545b47c84712b8779a9abd0cb</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7955a29353223010fe92ddeeff7b12a5</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-16 20:06:59</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
